description: Cognizant (Nasdaq-100: CTSH) engineers modern businesses. We help our clients modernize technology, reimagine processes and transform experiences so they can stay ahead in our fast-changing world. Together, we’re improving everyday life. See how at www.cognizant.com or @cognizant.

locations.line_1: Calle Moreno no. 845 to 899 on the corner of Calle Tacuarí no. 242 to 292
Science Hub Tower 4, 1110 Campus Avenue, Mckinley Hill Cyber Park 1st-4th floor

name: Cognizant

updates.text:
Our CEO Ravi Kumar S appeared on CNBC's 'Money Movers' to discuss Cognizant's plans to use generative AI to further propel upward social mobility across the workforce, the company's Q3 earnings, and more.

Watch the full interview: https://lnkd.in/exRXMBiz

Cognizant #Q3FY24 financial results are here. We continued to accelerate growth and gain traction in our client wins and investments in AI-driven platforms. 

Check out highlights from the third quarter ⬇️

Cognizant reports #Q3FY24 financial results. For full details, read our press release: https://cogniz.at/3NLYb8k

➡️ Revenue $5B, up 3% YoY
➡️ Adjusted Operating Margin | 15.3%
➡️ Closed 6 large deals >$100M TCV
➡️ Trailing 12-month bookings of $26.2B; book-to-bill of 1.3x

We’re thrilled to announce that Cognizant has partnered with Alnylam Pharmaceuticals to transform the company's IT operations. 

This collaboration aims to enhance Alnylam's operations by leveraging Cognizant's expertise to improve automation, reduce operational efforts, and ensure transparency in business decisions and unified performance accountability. 

Together, we’ll enable Alnylam to deliver transformative medicines. 
 
Read more: https://cogniz.at/48pqfrA

We are proud to be named to the 2024 American Opportunity Index as an Employer of Choice. 

The American Opportunity Index is the only employer ranking that measures how well America’s largest companies tangibly invest in their greatest asset – their employees – to drive business performance and individual career growth. 

Read more: https://cogniz.at/4fjtVxd

This latest expansion of Cognizant's collaboration with AWS Partners is designed to meet the growing market demand for IoT, data, AI and cloud adoption in Industry 4.0 applications, such as digital twins, simulations, manufacturing execution systems, edge computing, and operational technology (OT) cybersecurity solutions.

“With Cognizant’s technology IP and platform and industry expertise built on AWS and leveraging AWS’ advanced IoT and AI services, manufacturers will have access to high-quality levels of support and guidance to adopt smart manufacturing methodologies and achieve the associated benefits,” said Ozgur Tohumcu, GM Automotive and Manufacturing at AWS.

Read the release: https://cogniz.at/3NH7fLw

Implementing AI across your enterprise doesn't have to be difficult. Cognizant's Neuro (R) AI platform streamlines the entire process with powerful AI assistants, or agents, that transform data into actionable decisioning strategies. 

Swipe to learn how each agent works together to expand AI-powered decision-making, and discover their potential for your specific business needs.

Read more: https://cogniz.at/4fk4ziP
Bill McDermott joined CNBC to share his observations from Q3 2024. Listen to the $NOW earnings call replay for more: https://lnkd.in/eUYuu6xT

We are thrilled to announce Cognizant has been ranked no. 10 on Newsweek's list of America's Most Reliable Companies 2025. 
 
This recognition highlights businesses that provide exceptional reliability for clients through dependable actions and decisions. 
 
Newsweek, in collaboration with Statista, surveyed more than 1,700 decision-makers who do business with B2B companies across the country. The survey asked participants to rank companies based on likelihood of recommendation, ease of doing business, value for money, consistency of deliverables, and reputation for dependability. 
 
We'd like to thank our associates for continuing to deliver exceptional results for our clients.
 
Read more: https://lnkd.in/eFz4HG7T

As enterprises increasingly migrate their systems to the #cloud, they encounter significant challenges in controlling and optimizing their cloud expenditures.
 
The rapid growth of data and the need for real-time analytics have led to escalating costs and performance bottlenecks.
 
Traditional CPU-based methods can fall short in handling large-scale data processing efficiently, leading to higher potential operational costs and slower organizational decision-making.
 
To address the growing challenges enterprises face in controlling cloud computing costs, we’re enhancing our data modernization offering by leveraging the full stack NVIDIA accelerated computing platform, including NVIDIA RAPIDS, part of the NVIDIA AI Enterprise software platform, along with the Cognizant Data and Intelligence Toolkit.
 
“Our latest collaboration with NVIDIA aims to transform the way businesses process and analyze large datasets, delivering, we believe, unprecedented speed and efficiency,” said Annadurai Elango, EVP and Global Head of Core Technologies and Insights at Cognizant.
